title: bakaXL客户端闪退问题
author: wubingxuan2007
txt_content:
客户端突然闪退，这是BakaXL启动器的记录错误消息，麻烦大佬看看这个是什么情况




[spoiler]游戏核心：1.15.2
启动内存：1024 MB
操作系统：Microsoft Windows 10 企业版 x64
————————————————————
CPU：#0Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-7020U CPU @ 2.30GHz 
内存：3979
显卡：#0Intel(R) HD Graphics 620 
————————————————————
核心路径：D:\mc\.minecraft\versions\1.15.2
Java信息：C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.8.0_241\bin\javaw.exe (Java1.80 32 Bit)
BakaXL路径：D:\mc\BakaXL_Public_Ver_3.0.1.0.exe
————————————————————
错误日志：
[21:32:04] [Render thread/INFO]: Setting user: wubingxuan2007
[21:32:11] [Render thread/INFO]: Backend library: LWJGL version 3.2.2 build 10
[21:32:19] [Render thread/INFO]: Narrator library for x86 successfully loaded
[21:32:19] [Render thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default
[21:33:53] [Render thread/INFO]: OpenAL initialized.
[21:33:53] [Render thread/INFO]: Sound engine started
[21:33:54] [Render thread/INFO]: Created: 1024x1024x0 minecraft:textures/atlas/blocks.png-atlas
[21:33:54] [Render thread/INFO]: Created: 256x128x0 minecraft:textures/atlas/signs.png-atlas
[21:33:54] [Render thread/INFO]: Created: 1024x512x0 minecraft:textures/atlas/banner_patterns.png-atlas
[21:33:55] [Render thread/INFO]: Created: 1024x512x0 minecraft:textures/atlas/shield_patterns.png-atlas
[21:33:55] [Render thread/INFO]: Created: 256x256x0 minecraft:textures/atlas/chest.png-atlas
[21:33:55] [Render thread/INFO]: Created: 512x256x0 minecraft:textures/atlas/beds.png-atlas
[21:33:55] [Render thread/INFO]: Created: 512x256x0 minecraft:textures/atlas/shulker_boxes.png-atlas
[21:33:56] [Render thread/INFO]: Created: 256x256x0 minecraft:textures/atlas/particles.png-atlas
[21:33:56] [Render thread/INFO]: Created: 256x256x0 minecraft:textures/atlas/paintings.png-atlas
[21:33:56] [Render thread/INFO]: Created: 256x128x0 minecraft:textures/atlas/mob_effects.png-atlas
[21:35:10] [pool-2-thread-1/ERROR]: Couldn't get pending invite count
czg: Could not connect to Realms: Read timed out

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
卸载之前安装的所有 java ，安装这个 https://download.mcbbs.net/java/jre_x64.exe

然后在启动器中分配更多的内存

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
？看着不像是读取超时的问题
启动器内增加内存分配看看呢

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
wubingxuan2007 发表于 2020-5-6 22:17
非常感谢，问题解决了
那么，点下回复右下角的最佳
